reviews.review_msg: Simply the best prof at SFU. Been in her class for 3 semesters now and she is the most caring teacher I've had. She cares deeply about the learning of her students and as long as you keep up with the material and practice your Italian somewhat consistently, you'll be fine. Always encouraging and can give you plenty of help outside of class.

Chohre is the best professor at SFU that I've had so far.  She is helpful and very passionate about teaching, particularly teaching Italian and teaching about Italy.  She makes class entertaining and engaging. If you are considering taking Italian, definitely do!  You won't regret it!
Chohre is one of the best profs at sfu. She is a great teacher and is extremely helpful!
